name: LD48: Spellunker
description:
Cast some spells & stomp some slimes in your escalating journey to finish up a simple summon spell.

Help Alia outwit her wrying wizardly peers by collecting ingredients to a simple summoning spell, obtaining new powers on the journey deeper into caves.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD for movement.

Z or K for Jump.

X or L for special actions, by gaining new powers, directional inputs paired with X or L allows different actions.

Update: Thanks to the feedback, we’ve made few adjustments.


Version 0.2.2 patch notes:
Difficulty fix: Fixed the ingredients not stashing when entering Home, added clearer notifications on the fact that you can stash them when going home;
Accessibility fix: Made the menu buttons work by pressing [Z/J/Y/Enter] on keyboard too, instead of requiring mouse use;
Accessibility fix: Enabled basic controller support;
Collision fix: Slight player hitbox fixes;
Fixed a typo in "Fine Bloddstone".
Fixed player sprites reverting to older  sprite sheets

Version 0.2.1 patch notes:
Fixed few edge case crashing issues, this version has been hidden in light of the later fixes

Version 0.2 patch notes:
Fixed the save rooms being spawned way too far apart.
Fixed the controls on German keyboard layout (QWERTZ) and now allowing for WASD+KL controls instead of Arrows+ZX.
Fixed the lack of resource loss on death.
Fixed the numbers on resources gained/lost not showing.
Fixed the map not getting capped off with a ceiling.
Fixed the Ingredients counter also showing required amount of ingredients to progress.
Fixed 8th quest’s description listing off incorrect ingredients, also a typo in quest 5.

Updated the visual effect of resource collection for more clarity.

Web build is experimental, be warned of extra bugs and issues present in it.

Bug reports and feature suggestions are highly appreciated, as this was our first game as full team.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 by Team European Tangerine.
